Breadth-First.Explanation: Divergent listing of multiple coastal locations (Nice, Marseille, Porquerolles, Cassis, Cannes) to gather broad hypotheses
Continues divergent exploration by naming several possible towns (Vieux Nice, Antibes, Toulon, Cannes) based on visual cues

Depth-First.Explanation: Focused verification of the Le Suquet hypothesis using detailed architectural and environmental clues
Final confirmation of the identified location as Le Suquet

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from listing multiple candidate locations to in-depth analysis and confirmation of a single hypothesis
